title: Sarael's Reading
description: For days Sarael has felt as if a dark storm was gathering and would soon overtake her, ending everything that’s familiar—and now that storm has arrived. Nothing will keep Matteo from claiming his bride. Her destiny was written in his blood and the truth revealed in the tarot cards.The Hanged Man. The Tower. The Moon. She was created for him. She was born to be a vampire’s mate.Please A previous edition of this story was published by Ellora’s Cave. It has been extensively revised for this edition.
author: Jory Strong
